title: Return Kth to Last
description:
Implement method `kthToLast` with algorithm to find the kth to last element of a singly linked list.

### Examples

* `1->2->3->4->5->6, 3` -> `3`

### Notes

* If index is absent, return 0.
* Check [LinkedListNode](https://github.com/spolnik/JAlgoArena/blob/master/src/main/java/org/algohub/engine/type/LinkedListNode.java) class source code. If you don't want to quit this screen, make sure you open it in a new tab.

return.comment: kth to last element of a singly linked list

parameters.name: head
parameters.comment: Linked List where we need to find kth to last element
